meanings.definition: A musical performance involving multiple musicians playing together.
meanings.sent1: I went to a concert with my friends to listen to our favorite band.
meanings.sent2: The concert was held in a large stadium and tickets sold out quickly.
meanings.sent3: At the concert, the musicians played so loudly that the audience couldn't hear each other speak.
meanings.sent4: The harmony of the instruments in the concert created a symphony of sound.
meanings.sent5: The concert hall was filled with the sweet melodies of the orchestra.

meanings.definition: A public performance of music or dance.
meanings.sent1: The school choir put on a concert for the parents and teachers.
meanings.sent2: The ballet company's concert showcased their graceful movements and elegant costumes.
meanings.sent3: During the concert, the singer's voice echoed beautifully in the auditorium.
meanings.sent4: The concert was like a magical journey through different musical genres.
meanings.sent5: The audience clapped and cheered at the end of the concert, showing their appreciation.

meanings.definition: Agreement in purpose or feeling; consensus.
meanings.sent1: The team worked in concert to achieve their goal of winning the championship.
meanings.sent2: There was a concert among the group members on the best approach to the project.
meanings.sent3: In a rare moment of concert, everyone in the meeting agreed on the next steps.
meanings.sent4: The concert reached a peak when everyone shared the same vision for the future.
meanings.sent5: The sense of concert among the community led to positive changes in the neighborhood.
